parameter.name: defaultTTS
parameter.label: Default Text-to-Speech
parameter.description: The default text-to-speech service to use if no other is specified.

parameter.name: defaultSTT
parameter.label: Default Speech-to-Text
parameter.description: The default speech-to-text service to use if no other is specified.

parameter.name: defaultVoice
parameter.label: Default Voice
parameter.description: The default voice to use if no specific TTS service or voice is specified.

parameter.name: defaultHLI
parameter.label: Default Human Language Interpreter
parameter.description: The default human language interpreter to use if no other is specified.

parameter.name: defaultKS
parameter.label: Default Keyword Spotter
parameter.description: The default keyword spotting service to use if no other is specified.

parameter.name: keyword
parameter.label: Magic Word
parameter.description: The magic word to spot before initiating a dialog.

parameter.name: listeningItem
parameter.label: Listening Switch
parameter.description: If provided, the item will be switched on during the period when the dialog processor has spotted the keyword and is listening for commands.

parameter.name: listeningMelody
parameter.label: Listening Melody
parameter.description: A melody to be played to advertise the user the dialog processing is going to start, leave empty to disable it. (Spaced separated list of notes. Example: "A O:100 A':50")

parameter.name: enableCacheTTS
parameter.label: Enable TTS caching
parameter.description: true to allow TTS services to cache audio files on disk.

parameter.name: cacheSizeTTS
parameter.label: TTS Cache Size
parameter.description: The limit size of the TTS cache (in kB).

parameter.name: maxTextLengthCacheTTS
parameter.label: TTS Cache Maximum Text Length
parameter.description: The maximum length of texts handled by the TTS cache (in character). If exceeded, will pass the text to the TTS without storing it. 0 for no limit.
